title: Ham, Cheese and Egg Bake
ingredients: ['225g French bread, cut into 2.5cm cubes', '50g butter, melted', '115g Gruyere cheese, grated', '115g Cheddar cheese, grated', '275g diced cooked ham', '8 eggs, beaten', '350ml milk', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard', 'salt and pepper to taste', '175ml soured cream', '25g grated Parmesan cheese']
